OrgName: Rightside Group, Ltd. and all of its wholly-owned subsidiaries, which includes eNom, Inc.
activities: Use personal information associated with credit cards to authorize online payment for domain name registration.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We use personal information for responding to consumers’ requests; monitoring and providing services; enforcing our rights and the rights of third parties, and investigating and ensuring compliance with our terms and conditions of service.
recoursemech: Rightside has committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the US – EU [and EU-Swiss] Safe Harbor Principles to the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus. If a consumer does not receive timely acknowledgment of their complaint, or if it is not satisfactorily addressed by Rightside, they are invited to visit the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR web site at www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints for more information and to file a complaint.
